dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.title: Range Description
dataObjects.rights: © International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.rightsHolder: International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Moelants, T. & Ntakimazi, G. 2010. Bryconaethiops boulengeri. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description: Bryconaethiops boulengeri is known from throughout the Congo River basin but confirmed records from the main channel of the Lower Congo River are lacking. The type locality is from the Ogowe River, however it is probable that this type locality is not correct.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  Congo River basin in Republic of Congo and Democratic Republic of the Congo (Ref. 74421). Type locality in Ogowe is questionable as no other specimens are known from Ogowe drainage (Ref. 74421). Report from Lake Tanganyika (Ref. 4967) needs confirmation.
dataObjects.references: Paugy, D. 1984 Characidae. p. 140-183. In J. Daget, J.-P. Gosse and D.F.E. Thys van den Audenaerde (eds.) Check-list of the freshwater fishes of Africa (CLOFFA). ORSTOM, Paris and MRAC, Tervuren. Vol. 1. (Ref. 5331)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Congo and Ogowe River basins: Democratic Republic of Congo, Republic of Congo, and ?Gabon.

Reviewer/s
Brummett, R., Mbe Tawe, A.N., Dening Touokong, C., Reid, G.M., Snoeks, J. Staissny, M., Moelants, T., Mamonekene, V., Ndodet, B., Ifuta, S.N.B., Chilala, A., Monsembula, R., Ibala Zamba, A., Opoye Itoua, O., Pouomogne, V., Darwall, W. & Smith, K.

Contributor/s

Justification
The species is widespread or without major threats throughout central Africa and is assessed as Least Concern.
